E-Mail Messages
Date: Tuesday, 5/6/1992
Subject: Starting pitcher
Manager,
Believe it or not, but I am a starting pitcher!
Would you please treat me as one and put
me in the rotation?

Regards,
Erasmo Perez



Date: Monday, 5/12/1992
Subject: Claudio Tello
Claudio Tello is ready to be activated from the DL!

Regards,
Team Doctor



Date: Saturday, 5/17/1992
Subject: Contract extension
Hello,
I just wanted to let you know that I'm
in my last year of the contract.
Are you interested in giving me an extension?
I'd be happy to play for you again next year!

Regards,
Tom Meagher



Date: Sunday, 5/18/1992
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Evelio Luna



Date: Monday, 5/19/1992
Subject: Progress of James Harrison
Dear Sir,
James Harrison is doing pretty good at A Ft. Myers Miracle!
He has an ERA of 1.16, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
